DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness Blastocentesis Versus Trophectoderm Biopsy
DOC.detailed_description: The human embryo ( fertilised egg ) develop single cell go several developmental stage order prepare implantation inside womb . During fifth sixth day post fertilisation , embryo becomes blastocyst . It consist 100-150 cell two cell type . The inner cell mass ( ICM ) give rise baby trophectoderm cell become placenta . The trophectoderm ( TE ) cell surround ICM . Following formation two cell type , TE cell start produce fluid . The progressive accumulation fluid lead formation cavity expand form blastocele cavity . This cavity contain fluid know blastocoelic fluid ( BF ) . The fluid contain protein , cell genetic material . Traditionally make genetic diagnosis screen embryo abnormal chromosome number , cell remove ( biopsy ) trophectoderm . In experienced hand , safe procedure cause minimal damage embryo . However , recent study show blastocoele fluid may contain genetic material aspirate ( drawn ) blastocole cavity ( blastocentesis ) use genetic analysis embryo . This potentially less invasive harmful embryo . The aim study compare genetic analysis obtain follow blastocentesis versus trophectoderm cell biopsy .
